body:
My favorite basketball team, The Golden State Warriors, are currently doing pretty well in the Western Conference Finals against the Rockets... What is everyone's opinions of the Splash Brothers, and the rest of the crew? Any one like them? Dislike them? Iv'e actually heard that fans of other teams are sorta wanting the Warriors to win! Oh, and also what is your opinion on them potentially winning the Title? I'm just curious to see/hear what you guys think! 

-Wrecky
body_tagged:

title: Golden State Warriors!

replies.body: The Warriors are really good. However, my favorite team would be the New York Knicks. :P

replies.body: :O Hopefully they do good next year!

replies.body: Steph Curry is just too good. It'll be the cavs and the Warriors in the finals for sure.

replies.body:
Curry is just unstoppable w/ his stepback 3 point shots! im rooting for both Warriors and the Cavs
in the NBA finals! Blue and Yellow vs Red and Yellow!

replies.body: Everyone is saying the Warriors are done... I'm like.. They got to the finals.. Lebron is probably going to be out defended.. and Golden State has extremely high Home Court advantage.. How much better can it get?
replies.body_tagged: Everyone is saying the Warriors are done... I'm like.. They got to the finals.. Lebron is probably going to be out defended.. and Golden State has extremely high Home Court advantage.. How much better can it get?
